Locations.Name: Pallet Town
Locations.Description: A small town with a few houses and Professor Oak's Lab.

Locations.Name: Oak's Lab
Locations.Description: Professor Oak's famous laboratory, filled with Pokémon research equipment.

Locations.Name: Route 1
Locations.Description: A grassy path connecting Pallet Town and Viridian City. Wild Pokémon can be found here!

Locations.Name: Viridian City
Locations.Description: A bustling city with a Pokémon Center and Poké Mart.
